_sText:
Hey this is our second Map we finished togheter.

The Map is inspired by Z-machine and his great map surf_machine.
We know there are a lot of Machine maps out there and most of them are more bad then anything else.
We tryed to make it better. Make the best looking Machine Map with also a good gameplay.
We think we did a great job but at the end it´s up to you to decide if the mission is accomplished.

Well here are some informations about the map.

We added:

Radar Overview
Random Weapon Spawner
Unique Pre, and secret rooms 
Of course a lot of deteils
Some changes to the basic layout most machine maps have.

Sorry for the bad Screenshots, they are taken without antialaising and with middel Picture Quality, so they don´t show the real look of the map.

a small video that shows all secrets of our new map surf_megamachine, not nice but rarely xD
